title: WebEZ: Procedural Spider Web Environment Decoration
description: A plugin for creating procedural spider webs to decorate your level.
longDescription:
Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


This plugin contains four different types of spider web Blueprints (3 prior to 4.18) that can be placed and adjusted to decorate a level. BP_CornerWeb, BP_Web, and BP_CollumnWeb (4.18 + only) are procedural generated web meshes that can then be converted into static meshes once you are happy with the placement. Due to their procedural nature, there are infinite different web meshes that can be made, and they will always perfectly fit your level. The ability to convert to static mesh allows use with static lighting and improves performance. You can also reuse the static mesh with normal static mesh actors. BP_Hanging web is a rigged mesh of a tattered web that will have motion applied when an overlapping actor, such as a player, moves through it. All four have parameters for customizing the appearance.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
List of Features: Two Blueprints of procedurally generated spiderwebs that can automatically convert to static meshes. One Blueprint of a hanging, tattered web that will react to actor overlap with subtle motion.


Number of Blueprints: 4

Number of C++ Classes: 2

List of Modules: WebEZ - Developer

Number of Meshes: 1

Vertex Count: 121

Collision: Custom

Number of Master Materials: 3

Number of Material Instances: 4

Network Replicated: No

Number of Textures: 4


Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: Included in Plugin, Tutorial available at youtube.com/watch?v=EN6haSzsGls&feature=youtu.be

releaseInfo.releaseNote: 2.0, 4.18 update with an added web blueprint
